text:
2.0.40 will not start on a PC with a clean install of Windows 2000 w/SP3, and 
the error log reveals the following info:

[Tue Aug 13 03:51:07 2002] [crit] (22)Invalid argument: Parent: Failed
to create the child process.
[Tue Aug 13 03:51:07 2002] [crit] (22506)The handle is invalid.  :
master_main: create child process failed. Exiting.
[Tue Aug 13 03:51:07 2002] [notice] Parent: Forcing termination of
child process 3119360

Dave
creator: dave_tisdall@hotmail.com

text:
Anything unusual or add-on to your configuration?  Did you load additional
  modules, etc?

  Please attach your conf, the local install path of your Apache and use the
  command:  SET >setlist

  Feel free to email me with your SET if you are uncomforatble posting it.
  There aren't alot of ways for the child process creation to die with error
  22 --- so something unusual is wrong.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
